title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the country that was the most free in 2001.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a change in the data for Russia between 1991 and 2018 based on the data in the graph.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe one example of how a country consolidates democracy.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about democratic consolidation in Russia between 1995 and 2000, using the data in the graph and the examinerâ€™s knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain one change in Russia that occurred under Putin that has led to Russia and China having the same Freedom House score.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
